content:
ComboBoxState Enum

Definition

Specifies the visual state of a combo box that is drawn with visual styles.

In this Article

public enum ComboBoxState
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ComboBoxState

Remarks

The ComboBoxState values correspond to the states of the VisualStyleElement objects exposed by the VisualStyleElement.ComboBox.DropDownButton class. The ComboBoxState values are also used as an argument in the DrawDropDownButton and DrawTextBox methods.

Fields

Disabled

The combo box is disabled.
Hot

The combo box is hot.
Normal

The combo box has the default appearance.
Pressed

The combo box is pressed.
